name: PowBubbleShooter!
description:
A PowRanger! spin on the classic Bubble Shooter!

Description: Pop as many bubbles as possible in a fight to the death against the incoming horde of skittle-colored and poweranger-powered balls of doom from above!

Hotkeys:

Mouse - Play with your mouse!

M - Mute

R - Restart game (when gameover)

Q - Quit game
